title: Best of The Program | Guest: Bill O'Reilly | 2/28/20
description:
Coronavirus could change America forever and even affect the presidential race. But Bill O’Reilly joins to reinforce that now is a time for caution, not panic. And as Bernie Sanders explodes in the polls, is 2020 the year when our two-party system fractures into tribes? Glenn gives some coronavirus predictions to watch out for and premieres new theme music for the Democratic candidates.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
